mutants.code:
import re

def filter_words(sequence, num):
    cleaned_sequence = re.sub('', '', sequence)
    words_list = cleaned_sequence.split()
    filtered_words = [word for word in words_list if len(word) > num]
    return filtered_words

import re

def filter_words(sequence, num):
    cleaned_sequence = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', sequence)
    words_list = cleaned_sequence.split()
    filtered_words = [word for word in words_list if len(word) > num]
    return filtered_words

mutants.mutated_line: filtered_words = [word for word in words_list if len(word) >= num]

def filter_words(sequence, num):
    cleaned_sequence = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', sequence)
    words_list = cleaned_sequence.split()
    filtered_words = [word for word in words_list if len(word) <= num]

mutants.code:
import re

def filter_words(sequence, num):
    cleaned_sequence = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', sequence)
    words_list = cleaned_sequence.split()
    filtered_words = [word for word in words_list if len(word) != num]
    return filtered_words
